component.attributes:
&standard_uicomponent_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
activeIndex false java.lang.Integer 0 Index of the active tab.
style false java.lang.String Style of the root container of accordion panel
styleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the root container of accordion panel
disabled false java.lang.Boolean false Disables or enables accordion
effect false java.lang.String slide Effect to use when toggling the content
autoHeight false java.lang.Boolean true When enabled, highest content is used as the reference. Provides more consistent animations.
collapsible false java.lang.Boolean false Defines if accordion can be collapsed all together.
fillSpace false java.lang.Boolean false When enabled, accordion fills the height of it's parent.
event false java.lang.String Specifies the event to use to toggle a tab.
tabChangeListener false javax.el.MethodExpression void tabChangeListener(org.primefaces.event.TabChangeEvent) Server side listener to invoke when a tab has changed.
onTabChangeUpdate false java.lang.String Component(s) to update after tabChangeListener is invoked.
onTabChange false java.lang.String Client side callback to invoke when active tab changes.
dynamic false java.lang.Boolean false Specifies the toggleMode, dynamic setting fetches it's content with ajax on tab switch.
cache false java.lang.Boolean true When tab contents are lazy loaded by ajax toggleMode, caching only retrieves the tab contents once and subsequent toggles of a cached tab does not communicate with server. If caching is turned off, tab contents are refetched from server each time tab is clicked. This setting is true by default.
